Understate: The claim understates the fact that the "AR" in AR-15 does not stand for assault rifle.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim that the "AR" in AR-15 stands for assault rifle.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the "AR" in AR-15 stands for assault rifle without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to acknowledge the alternative explanation that the "AR" in AR-15 actually stands for ArmaLite Rifle, reflecting the company name of the original manufacturer of the weapon.
